prod_short_desc: Throw a LEGO® DUPLO® celebration with these buildable cakes!
prod_long_desc:
Create colorful cakes for any kind of party with LEGO® DUPLO® My First Celebration. Have fun with your preschooler as they build 3 individual cakes and a big layer cake! Toddlers will love to put the candles and decorations on top, then split the big cake into 4 pieces and share with family or friends as they learn about different occasions and how we celebrate them. DUPLO baby bricks are specially designed to be fun and safe for small hands.
Features a large layer cake and 3 individual cakes.
Accessory elements include candles and toppings for the cakes.
Role-play a celebration for any occasion with this amazing array of colorful cakes.
Have fun together as your toddler learns about sharing and celebrations with this versatile toy.
Mix and match the baby bricks and toppings to create cakes of all shapes and sizes with your child.
Develop early construction and fine motor skills with these simple builds.
Makes an ideal birthday gift for a preschool child.
LEGO® DUPLO® products are specially designed to be fun and easy for small hands.
Suitable for ages 1½-3.
Big layer cake with candles measures over 5” high, 5” wide and 5” long.
Small cone cake measures over 4” high, 2” wide and 2” long.
